entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pool's Island 2:30 PM NST Monday 30 January 2023

Humidity: 91 %
Dewpoint: 1.9°C
Wind: WSW 26 km/h gust 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Snow or rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain showers and ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast early this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 6 except minus 3 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 6 except minus 3 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 30 January 2023
